Book an Event
Book an Event
The St. Augustine Amphitheatre offers a variety of unqiue spaces available for private events and social gatherings. Nestled within Anastasia State Park, The St. Augustine Amphitheatre's natural surroundings create the ideal spot to welcome your guests and enjoy a breath of fresh air!
Booking Request Form
The St. Augustine Amphitheatre is available for rental by public, private and nonprofit groups. If you are interested in renting the facility please complete the form below. The event date is confirmed once the venue receives the signed Use Agreement and non-refundable deposit (base rental fee).
Fill out my Wufoo form!
